creator: f.mellentin@gmx.com
text:
The plan loading problem:
- "WebService (SOAP Request)" Sampler several times in your test plan
- Given incorrect IP address or server is down

-> You have to wait longer than 5 minutes.

I think JMeter tries to connect to the server WSDL and tried it several times.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Bugzilla is not a support forum.

Please subscribe to the JMeter user list and ask there.
